Plans are under way for a SCIENCE NEWS
PROGRAM for the junior high level
second semester, at WFBE-FM, the Flint
Public School Station© The first five
minutes of the program will deal with
science in the news and will be written
on a weekly basis. The last ten minutes
of the program will consist of stories
of “achievements“ in science, i,e, the
discovery of penicillin* discoveries in
the antarctic* new space developments*
etc. All these will be dramatized and
kept for use in the fall as a repeat
program with the first five minutes
replaced with science news©
